edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.utilities.todo

Class TodoList

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.utilities.todo.TodoList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TodoList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A represention of a list of Tasks. Does this by having an Arraylist as a private variable.
    Version:
    todo project for CS56 S13
    Author:
    Brandon Newman
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • printListNames

      • updateSortedLists

        public void updateSortedLists(java.util.ArrayList<List> lists,
                              java.util.ArrayList<List> sortedLists)
        The TodoList has a list of all Lists, but is only updated when the user wants to sort by name. The list of Lists is first emptied and refilled with this function. This method does not atually sort the list of Lists
        Parameters:
        lists - the unsorted ArrayList of Lists
        sortedLists - the ArrayList that will be populated with the unsorted ArrayList of Lists
